entree.name: Smoked Paprika & Chorizo Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Grapes & Sherry Cream

description.#text: Marinated pork tenderloin seasoned with smoked paprika, cumin, garlic, & coriander. Searred on the grill or pan-fried to medium-rare for optimal tenderness.

appetizers.name: Southwestern napoleons with lump crab > new item!

description.#text: Layers of light lump crab meat, bean & corn salsa, & our homemade flour tortillas.

main_courses.name: Jerk rotisserie chicken with fried plantains > new item!

description.#text: Skewers of shrimp marinated in lemongrass, garlic, & fish sauce then grilled to perfection. Served with spicy peanut sauce & jasmine rice.
